summary: The diff implements a comprehensive reel/short-video app replacement of the 3D car game frontend. All five requirements (REQ-10 through REQ-14) appear to be addressed except REQ-14. The car game files are cleared, a vertical snap-scroll feed with full-screen reel cards is implemented, action icons with like/comment/share are on the right side, a top nav with logo and tabs is present, 6 mock reels are seeded as static data with Pexels video URLs, and the dark orange-red accent theme is applied. However, the diff does not show the backend/main.mo file being modified, which is required by REQ-14.

missing_requirements.requirement: Clear out the existing Motoko backend actor so it is a clean placeholder with no car game logic, ready for future reel-app features.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include any changes to backend/main.mo. No added, modified, or removed file entry for the backend actor is present in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: A 'Save' / Bookmark action icon was added to the ActionIcons component in addition to the required Like, Comment, and Share icons.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only specifies like, comment, and share interaction icons. A fourth save/bookmark button was added without being requested.

hallucinated_features.description: An 'Explore' third tab was added to the top navigation bar beyond the two tabs specified.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies at least two tabs such as For You and Following. The implementation adds a third Explore tab which was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Search and Create (Plus) action buttons were added to the top navigation bar.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only specifies a minimal top navigation bar with app name/logo and tab navigation. Search and Create buttons were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Mute/unmute button and explicit play/pause tap controls were added to each reel card.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not specify mute toggle or explicit play/pause controls on the reel card beyond displaying a looping video placeholder.

hallucinated_features.description: A footer attribution link to caffeine.ai was added to the App component.
hallucinated_features.reason: No footer or attribution link was requested in the build request.
